channel.title: How Do You Delete NPC's And Change What Their Saying? And
channel.description: My server folder got messed up and restarted. But now I wanna delete a NPC or change what their saying and for e.g I wanna change what a NPC says like look here! I type look here! in client.java and it says it cant find it. Secondly, how do you delete NPC's? Also, where it shows the equipment bonus' of tiems how you change that to a diff colour and how you change your skill menu e.g where it shows your strength level and so on to a diff colour?

item.title: How Do You Delete NPC's And Change What Their Saying? And
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

delete npc’s
stand on the npc and type ::coordson to find out they’re X and Y coord
go into autospawn.cfg and search the coords then delete that guy

bonuses
them colours can’t be changed, that i know of

stats menu
go into client.java and search the command (“skillsmenu”)?
then there’s either a void in there or the menu that comes up
if it’s the void search that void
if not you should see the lines of the stats
like
@whi@Str -
or whatever
change the @whi@

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Delete NPC's And Change What Their Saying? And

item.title: How Do You Delete NPC's And Change What Their Saying? And

item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Nervermind, i fixed the talking prob but does anyone know how to delete NPC’s and change the equpiment bonus’ to a diff colour insetad of yellow and same with the stats menu where it shows your stats.?

Read full topic

item.title: How Do You Delete NPC's And Change What Their Saying? And
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

To change the bonuses of an item, you need to go into your item.cfg and change the stats.
